name: Santa Over Slept?!?!
description:
Play as Santa, building toys for the children of the world all the night before Christmas!

Stop the evil Krampus minions from breaking the toys you have made!

Keep the cursed Monkey wound or he'll take your time away!

------ IMPORTANT --------

use mouse for everything! wind up the monkey and grap with it

hover over the arrow in the top right if you are confused about the current recipe

press Z to scale up your window if it is too small

Made for the 'Santa Stuck in the Well' Jam!
